programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Nevin Shapiro, a football booster and a fixture on the Miami social scene, orchestrates a Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Attorney Kevin Cohen uses his adoption annex to take advantage of couples seeking to adopt children.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Tom Petters: Generous With Other People's Money
programme.desc: A Minneapolis businessman buys big companies and makes himself rich in the process.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Galleon Group: The Insider: Raj Rajaratnam
programme.desc: Raj Rajaratnam creates one of the biggest insider trading schemes in U.S. history.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: The son of a preacher bilks believers out of nearly $65 million promising huge returns for short-term investments.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A man claims to be reformed after serving seven years in prison for turning his carpet cleaning company into a multimillion-dollar scam.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.sub-title: Fake It to Make It; Kill the Witnesses
programme.desc: A promoter steals musical artists' money and dreams; an ex-IRS agent is caught in a $13 million accounting fraud and uses taxpayer money plotting to murder those who know too much.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: A counterfeit wine dealer dominates the fine wine scene, making millions selling his cheap basement blends through elite auction houses.

programme.title: American Greed
programme.desc: Healing turns harmful when pharmacist Barry Cadden chooses profits over safety while running a drug compounding center where mold and bacteria thrive.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: At Wichita's Sedgwick County Jail an inmate launches an attack on another, sending him to the emergency room; a detective must get to the bottom of it, while a pastor hopes to get to the heart of it.

programme.title: Lockup: Wichita: Extended Stay
programme.desc: Wichita, Kansas and surrounding Sedgwick County take pride in their Wild West roots, but Billy the Kid's gang would be seriously outgunned by the notorious gangs of modern day Wichita.
